meanings.definition: Conflict or rivalry within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The infighting among the team members was causing a lot of tension.
meanings.sent2: The infighting between the departments was affecting the company's productivity.
meanings.sent3: The infighting over who gets to use the office microwave first was getting out of hand.
meanings.sent4: The infighting for the last piece of cake at the party turned into a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The infighting for the leadership position was fierce and relentless.

meanings.definition: Engaging in a physical fight within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: They were infighting over the best way to approach the problem.
meanings.sent2: The team started infighting during the soccer match, causing chaos on the field.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were infighting over who gets to sit in the front seat of the car.
meanings.sent4: The infighting between the two rival gangs escalated quickly.
meanings.sent5: The infighting among the students for the last textbook led to a scuffle.
